about_the_game:
You wake up, alone. In the land you find yourself in called 'The Delta Labs', you must attempt to find your way out seemingly endless amounts of caverns of lab equipment, top of the line technology, and killer security robots. You need to watch every step you make, assure yourself that you do not fall into pits, run into lasers, or into a bath of electrified water.


The entire facility is void of life, nobody is around, besides two other things. You and a mysterious droid which you must avoid

Apparatus is currently in development by one sole developer and coming soon. The main campaign is expected to be above 2 hours long. Apparatus is a story based 2D Sci-Fi platformer with an additional level editor. The game is designed for those who are familiar with platformers but those who enjoy a mysterious story over platforming challenges will enjoy it as well.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or better
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: something that can output beeps and boops
  • Additional Notes: Its a 2D platformer you really don't need that good of a pc

short_description: Lost, trapped, and alone within the Delta Labs. You must find your way out with your life, any slight mess-up could be your life in this 2D story platformer
